issue.title: [Python] Type stubs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14901](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14901). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I was wondering whether generating python type stubs (.pyi) is on the backlog (for pyarrow). I can't find a ticket.

It would be very helpful to developer productivity when IDEs would pick them up.
